title: Senior UX Designer
desc: Design user-centered digital experiences. Conduct user research and create wireframes.

title: UI Designer
desc: Create visually appealing user interfaces. Design components and style guides.

title: Product Designer
desc: Design complete product experiences. Work from research to final implementation.

title: Graphic Designer
desc: Create visual content for print and digital. Design logos, brochures, and marketing materials.

title: Motion Designer
desc: Create animations and motion graphics. Design UI animations and video content.

title: UX Researcher
desc: Conduct user research and usability testing. Gather insights to inform design decisions.

title: Interaction Designer
desc: Design how users interact with products. Create micro-interactions and transitions.

title: Visual Designer
desc: Create visual language and brand identity. Design visual systems and assets.

title: Design Systems Manager
desc: Build and maintain design systems. Create reusable component libraries.

title: Web Designer
desc: Design responsive websites and landing pages. Create wireframes and visual designs.

title: Mobile App Designer
desc: Design native mobile applications. Create iOS and Android interfaces.

title: Illustrator
desc: Create custom illustrations and icons. Develop visual styles for brands.

title: Brand Designer
desc: Develop complete brand identities. Design logos, typography, and brand guidelines.

title: Prototype Designer
desc: Create interactive prototypes with Figma/ProtoPie. Test and validate design concepts.

title: UX Writer
desc: Write microcopy and interface text. Ensure clear and helpful user communication.

title: 3D Designer
desc: Create 3D models and visualizations. Design product renders and animations.

title: Accessibility Designer
desc: Ensure designs meet accessibility standards. Create inclusive user experiences.

title: Design Director
desc: Lead design team and set creative direction. Manage design projects and strategy.

title: Packaging Designer
desc: Design product packaging and labels. Create shelf-ready packaging solutions.

title: AR/VR Designer
desc: Design augmented and virtual reality experiences. Create immersive interfaces.

title: Design Intern
desc: Learn design principles and tools. Assist senior designers with projects.

title: Typography Designer
desc: Design custom fonts and typography. Create type systems for brands.

title: Icon Designer
desc: Design icon sets and pictograms. Create consistent visual symbols.

title: Information Designer
desc: Design data visualizations and infographics. Make complex information understandable.

title: Game UI Designer
desc: Design user interfaces for video games. Create HUD elements and menus.
